srl.corpus
Class Processor

java.lang.Object
  srl.corpus.Processor

public class Processor
extends java.lang.Object

Wraps the language processor, for easy interaction. That is the tokenizer splitter and search indexer analyzer (essentially the tokenizer plus a stop words list)
